sentences.en: During these weeks of intense struggle and ceaseless anxiety, Lord Beaverbrook rendered signal service.
sentences.cn: 在战斗非常激烈,令人无限忧虑的这几个星期里,比弗布鲁克勋爵作出了杰出的贡献.

sentences.en: His ceaseless chatter began to annoy me.
sentences.cn: 他不停的唠叨使我厌烦起来.

sentences.en: His ceaseless straining after brilliant epigrams quickly becomes irritating.
sentences.cn: 他不断追求漂亮警句的手法则很容易使人厌倦.

sentences.en: In the world of fashion it sometimes seems that the only constant is ceaseless change.
sentences.cn: 在时装界，有时似乎唯一永恒不变的东西就是不断的变化。

sentences.en: It filled me with awe , wonder, and fear, and I asked ceaseless questions.
sentences.cn: 这使我心里充满了敬畏, 惊疑和恐惧, 我没完没了地问着问题.

sentences.en: The ceaseless rain was bad for the crops.
sentences.cn: 绵绵不断的雨对庄稼很有害.

sentences.en: The conflict between them seems ceaseless.
sentences.cn: 他们之间冲突似乎没个止息.

sentences.en: The girl's ceaseless cry makes us feel pity for her.
sentences.cn: 这个小女孩不停的哭声使我们对她感到同情。

sentences.en: Their ceaseless noise annoyed the neighbours.
sentences.cn: 他们吵闹不停,打搅了邻居.

sentences.en: There is a ceaseless din in these courts.
sentences.cn: 在这一带的街道上,整天吵吵闹闹.

sentences.en: There was a ceaseless noise of machinery.
They enjoy popularity among our customers and the customers make enquires ceaseless.
sentences.cn: 在客户中受到极大欢迎,并且需求不断.

sentences.en: We look round in a new world, full of life , and motion , and ceaseless progress.
sentences.cn: 我们放眼四望,但见一派新天新地, 生机盎然, 变动不居,日新月异.

sentences.en: We must make ceaseless efforts to improve the quality of the products.
sentences.cn: 我们要不断地努力提高产品质量.

sentences.en: You heard the ceaseless high melancholy singing of the telegraph wires in the wind.
sentences.cn: 你听得见电话线在风中不停地发出尖锐、沉闷的声音.

永无休止的,没有尽头的

trans.tran_cn: <正> 不停的，（好像）无休止的，不断的，无休无止，无止无休，无了无休
